title: Petrochemicals
brief_description: This six part educational series deals with various aspects of the petrochemical industry and the part products play in everyday life. Parts of the program include: the building blocks, polymerisation reactions, polymers in use, solvents, detergents and industrial chemicals, agricultural chemicals, and chemistry in society.
